alert.note: Alert for McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:20PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central McMullen County through 645 PM CDT... At 620 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Tilden, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central McMullen County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
